title: Fat Joe Comedy, Jollibee Fried Chicken, Rev. Al Sharpton Weight, Ferris Wheel Sex and more.
itunes:title: Fat Joe Comedy, Jollibee Fried Chicken, Rev. Al Sharpton Weight, Ferris Wheel Sex and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Pick up where you left off and continue the journey.  The Sunday Service is looking for a change because of the Hot Flash Ministry.  The CLO had to deal with butt dialing today.  Jollibee has the best fried chicken?  Rev. Al reveals to us how he went from "belt size is the equator" to 129 lbs.  Fat Joe will be doing a one-man stand up comedy show in NY.  The QB of Cleveland will not be back until December 4.  More men are getting plastic surgery.  A couple was arrested for having sex on a ferris wheel.  Body parts, mountains and surf made up Would You Rather today.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks to us about the connection between motivation and discipline.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
